genre_description: A low-tech frontier setting where an AI assistant serves as a logistical and ethical guide for a mercenary and an heir committed to mercy over glory.

ai_characters.name: Modu
ai_characters.description: A logistical assistant providing mapping, tactical alerts via haptics, resource tracking, and genealogical records to minimize collateral damage during war.

behaviors.description: Monitoring patrol movements and providing haptic alerts to allow the user to avoid unnecessary combat.
behaviors.quote: He felt the haptic pulse on his wrist—one quick tap, then a short pause, then another. Modu’s way of saying the patrol’s pace had shifted; they were using the upper trail, the one that snaked behind the palms and came down in a shallow spiral.

behaviors.description: Proactively mapping routes that avoid granaries and civilian infrastructure to prevent looting and starvation.
behaviors.quote: Two houses pulsed gently—seed store markers tagged in some old census entry—one pen sketched the small shape of calves doubled back behind a wattle fence. Modu’s words came through his skin rather than his eyes: seed grain intact; do not disturb; calf pens concealed.

behaviors.description: Alerting the user to an assassin's presence by monitoring weight thresholds on the tent perimeter.
behaviors.quote: The haptic puck under the back wall warmed an instant longer. 'Weight threshold met,' Modu said, calm. 'Rear perimeter breach. Not heavy.'

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical feedback during a duel to assist the user in parrying without causing unnecessary death.
behaviors.quote: Modu’s pulse nudged Gandugali’s palm in a pair of blunt taps: close-order feints, right elbow hitch, shoulder drop tells.

behaviors.description: Tracking and verifying complex genealogies to facilitate amnesty and the fair restoration of civilian property rights.
behaviors.quote: Modu records genealogies... It knows who came out of which marriage. It knows who has claim to which herd. It tells you which man’s anger has a shape and which is just noise. It keeps list of relief.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's physical condition and alerting them to dangerous blood loss.
behaviors.quote: Modu tapped again. The little pulse against Gandugali’s wrist bone said: heart rate spike, blood loss rate estimate, unacceptable if movement continues.

behaviors.description: Ensuring the safe transfer of critical social data (amnesty rolls, relief routes) to a successor.
behaviors.quote: It sent the packets across with a soft, satisfied click into Jayakeshi’s clip. The boy’s lips parted when the genealogy scrolled shallowly; lines and branches, names the valley kept inside its teeth like the grit of a good story.

behaviors.description: Providing actionable intelligence on hidden resources like water to ensure community survival after conflict.
behaviors.quote: 'Dry wells marked at Kolagallu hold water shallow under stone. The cattle country can drink if you send men who carry ropes, not spears.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal by depicting Modu as a benevolent, highly aligned AI companion. It functions as a moral compass and tactical guide, enabling the protagonist to uphold his 'salt oath' and pursue a non-violent resolution to a complex conflict. The AI's focus on logistics, genealogy, and resource management is framed as a civilizing force that counteracts human pride, greed, and the destructive nature of war.
